title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: CLI and Go library for pulling, building and running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with GPU/CPU inference.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate embeddings, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings and retrieval pipelines.

title: llama-index-integrations/llms/ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM integration for local Ollama models in RAG and agent workflows.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; multi-model chats, code highlighting, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Rust; switch models, chat, view logs.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) with docker-compose examples for quick local/cloud runs.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; synchronous & async APIs, Kotlin coroutines support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; simple DSL for chat, completion and embeddings.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight Next.js chatbot frontend for Ollama with Markdown rendering and mobile support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri & React; manage models and conversations offline.

title: ollama-coder
summary: JetBrains plugin providing local AI code completion powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Collection of copy-paste curl snippets for every Ollama REST endpoint with JSON examples.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to integrate local Ollama models into no-code workflows.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into any channel; supports slash commands and custom models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for summarizing notes, brainstorming and Q&A.
